boardText.text: You are safe about security and signing since we are using latest AWS tech.
Perform actions in a virtual location as if you and your team were physically present in that location.
Present, Brief, Brainstorm or simply explain with our toolset including a presentation screen and a whiteboard.
Increased memory retention, performing dangerous tasks in a risk free environment, the ability to repeat exercises, isolation from distractions and detailed skills assessment.
Just pickup your device of choice: Desktop, Mobile, VR. No matter which device you choose, you can jump onboard at anytime from anywhere.
Get insights from your training to ensure that every component of the Learning course is helping trainees towards achieving their objectives and goals.
